info.title: SqlManagementClient
info.description: The database management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs that interact with database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases, servers, and other entities.

get.description: Gets a database's blob auditing policy.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database for which database blob audit policy is defined.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the database blob auditing policy.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidDatabaseBlobAuditingPolicyCreateRequest - The create database blob auditing policy request does not exist or has no properties object.

 * 400 InvalidBlobAuditActionsAndGroups - Invalid audit actions or action groups.

 * 400 DataSecurityInvalidUserSuppliedParameter - An invalid parameter value was provided by the client.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 SourceDatabaseNotFound - The source database does not exist.

 * 500 DatabaseIsUnavailable - Loading failed. Please try again later.

 * 500 GetBlobAuditingPolicyFailed - Failed to get Auditing settings

put.description: Creates or updates a database's blob auditing policy.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database for which database blob audit policy will be defined.

200.description: Successfully set the database blob auditing policy.

201.description: Successfully created the database blob auditing policy.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidDatabaseBlobAuditingPolicyCreateRequest - The create database blob auditing policy request does not exist or has no properties object.

 * 400 InvalidBlobAuditActionsAndGroups - Invalid audit actions or action groups.

 * 400 DataSecurityInvalidUserSuppliedParameter - An invalid parameter value was provided by the client.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 SourceDatabaseNotFound - The source database does not exist.

 * 500 DatabaseIsUnavailable - Loading failed. Please try again later.

 * 500 UpsertBlobAuditingPolicyFailed - An error has occurred while saving Auditing settings, please try again later

DatabaseBlobAuditingPolicy.description: Contains information about a database Blob Auditing policy.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

DatabaseBlobAuditingPolicyProperties.description: Properties for a database Blob Auditing policy.

state.description: Specifies the state of the policy. If state is Enabled, storageEndpoint and storageAccountAccessKey are required.

storageEndpoint.description: Specifies the blob storage endpoint (e.g. https://MyAccount.blob.core.windows.net). If state is Enabled, storageEndpoint is required.

storageAccountAccessKey.description: Specifies the identifier key of the auditing storage account. If state is Enabled, storageAccountAccessKey is required.

retentionDays.description: Specifies the number of days to keep in the audit logs.

auditActionsAndGroups.description: Specifies the Actions and Actions-Groups to audit.

storageAccountSubscriptionId.description: Specifies the blob storage subscription Id.

isStorageSecondaryKeyInUse.description: Specifies whether storageAccountAccessKey value is the storageâ€™s secondary key.
